subsection_content: Ascariasis is an infection of parasitic worms in the human body from the larval stage to adulthood. Adult worms can be more than 30cm long. Roundworm disease is common in children in tropical regions, with humid climates, poor hygiene, lack of toilets... Although the disease is common globally, people with mild disease often have no symptoms, while people with severe disease have serious complications may occur. (2)
subsection_title: benh giun dua.json. What is roundworm disease?
subsection_data:
benh giun dua.json. What is roundworm disease?
Ascariasis is an infection of parasitic worms in the human body from the larval stage to adulthood. Adult worms can be more than 30cm long. Roundworm disease is common in children in tropical regions, with humid climates, poor hygiene, lack of toilets... Although the disease is common globally, people with mild disease often have no symptoms, while people with severe disease have serious complications may occur. (2)
